knimeNode.name: Stop word Filter
knimeNode.shortDescription: Filters terms contained in the stop word file.

fullDescription.intro: Filters all terms contained in the specified stop word file.
fullDescription.option: If deep preprocessing is checked, the terms contained inside the documents are filtered too, this means that the documents are changed, which is more time consuming.

ports.dataIn: The input table which contains the terms to convert.

dataOut.name: Filtered terms and related documents output table
